name: Apple
detailedDescription: A fresh and juicy apple, perfect for a healthy snack. Apples are rich in fiber and vitamins, making them a great addition to your daily diet. They can be eaten as a snack, added to salads, or used in desserts.

name: Banana
description: A ripe banana with a sweet taste.
detailedDescription: Ripe bananas with a sweet taste, great for smoothies or a quick bite. Bananas are rich in potassium and provide a quick source of energy. They are ideal for pre-workout snacks or to curb hunger cravings throughout the day.

name: Carrot
detailedDescription: Crunchy and delicious carrots, rich in vitamin A and perfect for salads. Carrots are a versatile vegetable that can be eaten raw, cooked, or blended into juices. They support healthy vision and skin.

name: Broccoli
detailedDescription: Fresh and green broccoli florets, great for steaming or adding to stir-fries. Broccoli is high in fiber, vitamin C, and vitamin K, making it a nutritious addition to your meals. It pairs well with garlic and soy sauce.

name: Tomato
description: Juicy red tomatoes full of flavor.
detailedDescription: Juicy red tomatoes full of flavor, perfect for salads or sandwiches. Tomatoes are rich in antioxidants like lycopene, which may help reduce the risk of certain diseases. They are a staple ingredient in many cuisines.

name: Orange
detailedDescription: Citrusy and sweet oranges, packed with vitamin C for a refreshing snack. Oranges are perfect for juicing or eating as a quick snack. They support immune health and help keep your skin healthy and glowing.

name: Strawberry
description: Fresh, red strawberries packed with nutrients.
detailedDescription: Fresh, red strawberries packed with nutrients, perfect for desserts or snacking. Strawberries are a great source of vitamin C and antioxidants. They are delicious when paired with chocolate or added to smoothies.

name: Blueberry
detailedDescription: Sweet and tangy blueberries, a great source of antioxidants. Blueberries can be eaten fresh, added to cereals, or baked into muffins and cakes. They help improve memory and cognitive function.

name: Potato
description: Fresh potatoes perfect for any dish.
detailedDescription: Fresh potatoes perfect for any dish, from mashed potatoes to fries. Potatoes are a versatile ingredient that can be boiled, fried, or baked. They are rich in carbohydrates and provide energy for daily activities.

name: Watermelon
detailedDescription: Large and juicy watermelon slices, perfect for a refreshing summer snack. Watermelons are hydrating and low in calories, making them a great choice for hot weather. They are rich in vitamins A and C.
